text: pratiksepa karannanva ovun tamange kopayehi gæli sitiyadima allah ovunva yatapat kara dæmuveya. (mema yuddhayedi) ovun kisima yahapatak at kara gatte næta. (siyaluma akarayenma parajayama at kara gatha. namut visvasavantayinva allahma araksa kara gatteya). ema (agal) yuddhayedi visvasavantayinta allahma pramanavat keneku vasayen sitiyeya. allah (siyallantama vada) itamat saktivantayeku vasayen ha balasampannayeku vasayenda sitinneya
